channel.title: Server offline problem
channel.description: My server has been going down in Runelocus as well as Moparscape server status page and my Runelocus status checker says offline. I know I've port forwarded correctly since I've been able to have players on before this. My server is up right now and it still says my server is offline, I have all ports forwarded to 43594 as I've just checked, what could this be?

item.title: Server offline problem
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

what’s up with the moparscape server status page anyways it says i gotta wait for my server 24 hours for it to appear to pepole :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Server offline problem
item.dc:creator: @shayd3e shayd3e
item.description:
@shayd3e wrote:

login with your ip not from localhost…
if you are using a no-ip then log in with ####.no-ip.biz and see if it works
if it doesnt then maybe your portforwarding problems

Read full topic

item.title: Server offline problem
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

and why dont you check yourself by logging in with your ip.....

Well no duh I would be able to login as my IP is hosting the server so I would be able to login no matter what, even if I haven’t port forwarded yet.

Read full topic
